Question: Baseus Technology (HK) Co., Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Baseus Technology (HK) Co., Limited

Baseus Eli Sport 1 Open-Ear True Wireless Earphones
- Open-ear design with water-resistant finish and flexible ear hooks
- Innovative deep bass boost algorithm and low latency
- Advanced Baseus Rapid Charge technology for extended battery life

Baseus Spacemate Series 11-Port USB-C Dock
- High-grade, magnetic docking station with 10Gbps transfer speeds
- 100W USB-C fast charging and multiple connectivity options
- Multi-Stream Transport for simultaneous output on up to 3 display screens

Baseus Blade2 Ultra-thin Laptop Power Bank
- Slim 10mm profile with 12000mAh battery capacity
- APP Intelligent Control and 65W fast charging output
- Dual C-Port Setup for simultaneous charging of two devices

Baseus GaN5 Pro Desktop 240W Fast Charger
- Single-Port 240W Output and 5-Port 240W Output functionality
- Baseus Digital Intelligent technology for optimizing power delivery
- Baseus Cooling Technology for preventing overheating

Baseus Security Camera Series
- Expandable local storage of up to 16TB with advanced solar panel
- Detailed 3K videos, ultra-clear night vision, and wide-angle views
- User-friendly Baseus app for real-time control and customizable features
Summary_cn:
Baseus科技（香港）有限公司

Baseus Eli Sport 1 感应式真无线耳机
- 开放式设计，防水外观和柔软耳挂
- 创新的低音增强算法和低延迟
- 先进的Baseus快速充电技术，续航时间更长

Baseus Spacemate系列11口USB-C扩展坞
- 高级磁性扩展坞，传输速度达10Gbps
- 100W USB-C快充和多种连接选项
- 多流传输技术，可同时连接3个显示屏输出

Baseus Blade2超薄笔记本电源
- 10mm超薄机身，12000mAh电池容量
- APP智能控制和65W快速充电输出
- 双C-Port设置，可同时给两个设备充电

Baseus GaN5 Pro桌面240W快速充电器
- 单口240W 输出和5口240W输出功能
- Baseus数字智能技术，优化电力传输
- Baseus散热技术，防止过热

Baseus安防摄像头系列
- 最多可扩展16TB的本地存储，配备先进的太阳能板
- 提供清晰的3K视频、超强夜视和广角视野
- 用户友好的Baseus应用，实时控制和可自定义功能
